fields.name: DayOfWeek
fields.description: Day of the week to run assessment.

fields.name: Enable
fields.description: Enable or disable assessment schedule on SQL virtual machine.

fields.name: MonthlyOccurrence
fields.description: Occurrence of the DayOfWeek day within a month to schedule assessment. Takes values: 1,2,3,4 and -1. Use -1 for last DayOfWeek day of the month

fields.name: StartTime
fields.description: Time of the day in HH:mm format. Eg. 17:30

fields.name: WeeklyInterval
fields.description: Number of weeks to schedule between 2 assessment runs. Takes value from 1-6
